title: Bug splat when launching legacy client and running alpha client skips the patcher
body:
So im really confused on whats going on with my league clients since i play on the alpha it still patches but i get bug splats every time I open the game and it doesnt do anything that i can see. 
Also on alpha client It shows the blood moon diana and on legacy it shows the warwick idk what this means but I also want to know how to uninstall the alpha client

replies.body: You may have a bad install or something else that's failing to render the game.  Your best bet may be to perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to fix it up.  Let me know if you continue to have issues, though, I suggest testing it in a custom game to prevent penalties.  Let me know!

I have this issue too.  Start the game up, click launch, bug splat.  It'll still start the game and play okay from what I can see, but always a bug splat when I hit launch.  I've repaired as well as reinstalled with no improvement.

Thanks for this info.  I'm curious if your PC settings my be blocking game files from being scanned and resulting in that bugsplat because it can't load.  In this case, try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide instead.  This will make sure the game has access to load.  Let me know if that works!

Running the client as administrator still resulted in bugsplat.  The other things are fine as well.  I can tell you this just started happening after the recent patch and was totally fine before it.  Also is the splash screen supposed to be Diana or Warwick?  For some reason I'm back to Warwick when it was Diana.

That's really strange, but thanks for trying.  The login screen should be Diana.  o_o  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look at your specific issue.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) so we can get more context too by attached the logs it provides in your ticket.  We'll get back to you!

Have you guys found a solution for this? I am having tons of problems since 7.4... I can no longer use Alpha Client, the old client freezes in champ select, and now I can't even get to the 'PLAY' button because it says an unspecified error.... I've literally been trying to fix this for over 4 hours....
My login screen is Warwick as well, went back at 7.4 patch, even Dyrus streaming he has Warwick as well.

Hi!

I am experiencing exactly the same issue. Please if you found a solution let me know, it would be really helpful!

Thanks!

ElPouro
I can relate, I get bugsplat everytime I try to launch the legacy client the first time.

Same here, since last patch when I hit play it bug splats on login screen.
Did fresh install, same thing on legacy client. Well I mean it's not legacy yet right.
You just trying to get us to move to the new one but you don't have item sets....and it's layout is a  terrible mess.
